definitions.definition: The science of dating samples of rock or sediment .
examples: Geochronology allows us to see more precisely how the world has evolved.

definitions.definition: Any one of the methods by which the age of different samples of rock can be determined.
examples: The history of the East–Antarctic shield has been uncovered through uranium–lead geochronology .

definitions.definition: The division of ancient time into named subdivisions / periods

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The science of dating samples of rock or sediment .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) Any one of the methods by which the age of different samples of rock can be determined.
( uncountable ) The division of ancient time into named subdivisions / periods
